name: Cordyceps (raidrDevs, devN games, TheF1ip)
description:
Protect the Girl, Seek Safety, Stop the Music...

Set in Medieval Times, an exiled Knight travels to a distant village in hopes of starting a new life. After discovering a terrible fate has fallen onto the town, he tasks himself with protecting a small girl found in the village from a flesh-hungry monster that roams the town. The monster is controlled by music that is being played on a pipe organ at the villages cathedral where the player must take the little girl too after finding 2 items that is essential to defeating the monster. 

Game Overview:

Cordyceps is a horror survival game with a Fixed-Camera System and retro art style. The game is made in Unreal Engine 4 and uses downgrades assets to create a retro PSP look. The player is tasked with finding 2 objective items within a survival map section without being killed by the monster. The main objective is to protect the little girl that the player finds once arriving in the village and kill the monster by stopping the music.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact
